caption: Planning
description:
Task Delegation Accuracy
Deviation from best / ground-truth planning graph:
Graph Edit Distance: distance measure between the two graphs.
Structural Similarity Index: single measure for node and edge similarities between the two graphs.
Path Length Similarity: comparing the paths between any two nodes in the two graphs. Longer paths represent more work, so it is important not to “overshoot” here.
Complexity Score: total sum of nodes and edges, the higher, the more complex the MAS is.
Redundancy Score: nodes that are not present in the ground truth graph, are likely to be redundant and so might be the corresponding subtasks.
name: planning
